tarif_xml:
{"fares":[{"fare":"KKCOVBQ","airline_fil":"S7","airline_market":"S7","city_depart":"TSE","city_arrive":"SEL"},{"fare":"VKCOVBS","airline_fil":"S7","airline_market":"S7","city_depart":"SEL","city_arrive":"TSE"}],"rules":[[{"rule_code":"RU","rule_title":"RULE APPLICATION","rule_text":"FROM/TO AREA 3 S7 SPECIAL PRORATE ECONOMY CLASS FLEX FARE APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS ALL SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON S7 SEGMENTS ONLY. BAGGAGE PROVISIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH IATA RESO 302. INCLUDED- -1 CABIN BAGGAGE UP TO 10KG AND 115CM /55CM/40CM/20CM/ -FOR ADULTS AND CHILDREN -BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE 1 CHECK BAG UP TO 23KG -FOR INFANTS -BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE 1 CHECK BAG UP TO 10 KG. -SEAT SELECTION DURING CHECK-IN/VIA WWW.S7.RU AND AT THE AIRPORT/ -100 PERCENT MILES EARNED AT CHARGE- -EXTRA BAG -SEAT SELECTION DURING SALE AT CHARGE/NOT FOR EXTRA SPACE SEAT/. -EXTRA SPACE SEAT. -SPECIAL MEAL /IF AVAILABLE/. -UPGRADE TO BISINESS WITHOUT LOUNGE ACCESS /VIA WWW.S7.RU OR DURING CHECK-IN AT THE AIRPORT/.
"},{"rule_code":"MX","rule_title":"MAX STAY","rule_text":"FOR KKCOVBQ TYPE FARES TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 330 DAYS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.
"},{"rule_code":"SR","rule_title":"SALES RESTRICT","rule_text":" TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON S7 . NOTE - SALES PERMITTED ON TICKET STOCK VALIDATED OR PLATED S7/421 ONLY.
"},{"rule_code":"AP","rule_title":"ADVANCE RES/TKT","rule_text":" RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WAITLIST AND STANDBY NOT PERMITTED. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 336 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 72 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WAITLIST AND STANDBY NOT PERMITTED. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 168 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WAITLIST AND STANDBY NOT PERMITTED. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. WAITLIST AND STANDBY NOT PERMITTED. TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 40 MINUTES AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
"},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" CANCELLATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 30.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND. NOTE - -CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. CHILDREN DISCOUNTS ARE NOT APPLIED. INFANTS WITHOUT A SEAT - WITHOUT CHARGE. -CHARGE IS ALWAYS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM EXCHANGE RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. A.IN CASE OF FULLY UNUSED TICKET - REFUND THE FARE PAID. CHARGE FOR REFUND IS APPLIED. B.IN TRANSFER POINT/ON OUTBOUND/- -IN CASE OF PARTLY USED TICKET - REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE/S/ OF THE USED S7 SEGMENT/S OR ONE WAY NORMAL ECONOMY CLASS FARE/S/ OF THE USED PARTNER SEGMENT/S/ IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. CHARGE FOR REFUND IS APPLIED. -APPLICABLE ONE WAY IS THE ONE WAY FARE WITHIN THE SAME FARE FAMILY /FLEX/ AND THE SAME OR HIGHER RBD. -IF THERE IS NO APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE/S/ OF THE USED SEGMENT/S/ - CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS /VIA TECH-AT-S7.RU/. C.IN TURNAROUND POINT -IN CASE OF PARTLY USED TICKET - REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY SPA TRANSFER FARE OF THE USED SEGMENTS. CHARGE FOR REFUND IS APPLIED. -APPLICABLE ONE WAY IS THE ONE WAY FARE WITHIN THE SAME FARE FAMILY/FLEX/ AND THE SAME OR HIGHER RBD IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. -IF THERE IS NO OW SPA TRANSFER FLEX FARE IN APPROPRIATE CLASS OF SERVICE - REFUND HALF OF THE FARE PAID. D.IN TRANSFER POINT/ON INBOUND/- -IN CASE OF PARTLY USED TICKET - REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND SUM OF THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY SPA TRANSFER FARE OF THE USED SEGMENTS AND THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE/S/ OF THE USED S7 SEGMENT/S/ OR OW NORMAL ECONOMY CLASS FARE/S/ OF THE USED PARTNER SEGMENT/S/ IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. CHARGE FOR REFUND IS APPLIED. -APPLICABLE ONE WAY IS THE ONE WAY FARE WITHIN THE SAME FARE FAMILY /FLEX/ AND THE SAME OR HIGHER RBD. -IF THERE IS NO APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE/S/ OF THE USED SEGMENT/S/ - CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS /VIA TECH-AT-S7.RU/. -IF THERE IS NO OW SPA TRANSFER FLEX FARE IN APPROPRIATE CLASS OF SERVICE - HALF OF THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE USED IN REFUND CALCULATION. -RULES FOR CANCELLATION APPLY BY PRICING UNIT. -WHEN COMBINING ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS THE MOST RESTRICTIVE CANCELLATION CONDITIONS APPLY FOR THE ENTIRE PRICING UNIT. -REFUND OF UNUSED TICKETABLE TAXES/FEES/CHARGES IS PERMITTED. CANCELLATIONS AFTER DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 80.00 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - -CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. -CHILDREN DISCOUNTS ARE NOT APPLIED. INFANTS WITHOUT A SEAT - WITHOUT CHARGE. -CHARGE IS ALWAYS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM EXCHANGE RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. -REFUND OF UNUSED TICKETABLE TAXES/FEES/CHARGES IS PERMITTED. -RULES FOR CANCELLATION APPLY BY PRICING UNIT. -WHEN COMBINING ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS THE MOST RESTRICTIVE CANCELLATION CONDITIONS APPLY FOR THE ENTIRE PRICING UNIT. -INVOLUNTARY REFUND- -FOR FULLY UNUSED TICKET-REFUND THE FARE PAID. -FOR PARTLY USED TICKET /IN TRANSFER POINT/- APPLY EZ 1/12/4 OR CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS /VIA TECH-AT-S7.RU/. -FOR PARTLY USED TICKET/IN TURNAROUND POINT/- REFUND THE HALF OF THE FARE PAID. -REFUND OF ALL UNUSED TAXES/FEES/CHARGES IS PERMITTED. -IN ANY CASES- -REFUNDS MAY BE MADE WITHIN 1 YEAR FROM -DATE OF ISSUE - FOR UNUSED TICKETS. -DATE OF DEPARTURE ON FIRST FLIGHT COUPON - FOR PARTLY USED TICKETS. CHANGES ANY TIME CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. NOTE - -CHANGE IS A ROUTING/DATE/FLIGHT/BOOKING CLASS MODIFICATION. -CHANGES ARE PERMITTED WITH CHARGE/SEE THE DETAILS IN SECTIONS -CHANGES BEFORE DEPARTURE- AND -CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE-/ -CHANGES MAY BE DONE ONLY WITHIN FLEX FARE FAMILY ON S7 SEGMENTS. CHANGES OF THIS FARE TO ANY BASIC FARE ON S7 SEGMENTS IS NOT PERMITTED. -RULES FOR CHANGES APPLY BY FARE COMPONENT. -IN CASE OF COMBINATION CHARGE THE HIGHEST FEE OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS. -WHEN CHANGES ARE MADE NEW FARE AMOUNT FOR THE ENTIRE TICKET SHOULD BE EQUIAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS FARE AMOUNT FOR THE ENTIRE TICKET. FARE AMOUNT-PUBLISHED FARE LEVEL IN CURRENCY OF THE COUNTRY OF COMMENCEMENT OF TRANSPORTATION. -IN CASE OF CHANGES OF A FULLY UNUSED TICKET -CURRENT FARES/TAXES/BSR ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. -IN CASE OF CHANGES OF A PARTIALLY USED TICKET- HISTORICAL FARES/TAXES/BSR ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUANCE SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. -S7 YQ COMPENSATION TAX SHOULD BE ADDITIONALLY COLLECTED FOR THE CHANGED SEGMENT/S/ EVERY TIME IN CASE OF CHANGES. -FOR UPGRADING- -UPGRADING IS PERMITTED TO ANY HIGHER SPA TRANSFER FARE OR DIRECT FARES COMBINATION /WITHIN FLEX FARE FAMILY ON S7 SEGMENTS/ FOR THE CHANGED TRANSFER ROUTE/TO/FROM TURNAROUND POINT/. -PASSENGER WILL PAY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE ORIGINAL FARE AND THE NEW FARE OR FARE COMBINATION. -IN CASE OF NO-SHOW CHARGE FOR NO-SHOW IS APPLIED/SEE THE DETAILS IN SECTION -CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE-/. -IF NEW TICKET IS SUBSEQUENTLY CANCELLED CANCELLATION RULES OF THE FARE SPECIFIED IN THE NEW TICKET WILL APPLY. -FOR REROUTING- -REROUTING IS PERMITTED FOR OUTBOUND OR INBOUND SECTORS ONLY. -REROUTING IN TRANSFER POINT IS NOT PERMITTED. -IN CASE OF NO-SHOW CHARGE FOR NO-SHOW IS APPLIED/SEE THE DETAILS IN SECTION -CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE -/. -REROUTING OF DOMESTIC ITINERARY TO INTERNATIONAL ITINERARY IS NOT PERMITTED. -IN CASE OF REROUTING AND ADDING NEW SEGMENT/S/ TO THE ITINERARY S7 YQ COMPENSATION TAX MUST BE COLLECTED FOR ANY NEW SEGMENT/S/ IF THE REISSUE IS PROCESSED IN GDS DIFFERENT FROM SITA GABRIEL AND SIRENA TRAVEL. -CHANGES MAY BE MADE WITHIN 1 YEAR FROM -DATE OF ISSUE FOR UNUSED TICKETS -DATE OF DEPARTURE ON FIRST FLIGHT COUPON- FOR PARTLY USED TICKETS. CHANGES BEFORE DEPARTURE CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. NOTE - -CHANGES ARE PERMITTED WITHOUT CHARGES. CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 80.00 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - -CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. CHILDREN DISCOUNTS ARE NOT APPLIED TO THE CHARGE. INFANTS WITHOUT A SEAT - WITHOUT CHARGE. -CHARGE IS ALWAYS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM EXCHANGE RATE ON THE DATE OF REISSUE.
"},{"rule_code":"FL","rule_title":"FLT APPLICATION","rule_text":"FOR KKCOVBQ TYPE FARES THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING KC FLIGHTS 577 THROUGH 578 KC FLIGHTS 697 THROUGH 698 KC FLIGHTS 1294 THROUGH 1297 KC FLIGHTS 1351 THROUGH 1355 S7 FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 4999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY KC FLIGHT ANY S7 FLIGHT. NOTE - -NOT VALID ON ANY CODE SHARE FLIGHTS WHERE KC IS A MARKETING CARRIER. -SEE FARE DISPLAY FOR ROUTING INFORMATION.
"},{"rule_code":"CD","rule_title":"CHILD DISCOUNTS","rule_text":"FOR KKCOVBQ TYPE FARES ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11. ID REQUIRED - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT. NOTE - MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCED BY A PASSPORT ETC MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING. OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - NO DISCOUNT. NOTE - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 YEARS TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED AT THIS FARE. OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT. ID REQUIRED - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCED BY A PASSPORT ETC MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING. OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT. ID REQUIRED - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT. NOTE - MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCED BY A PASSPORT ETC MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING. OR - INFANT WITH A SEAT RESIDENT -1 - NO DISCOUNT. NOTE - UNACCOMPANIED INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS- TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED AT THIS FARE.
"},{"rule_code":"OD","rule_title":"OTHER DISCOUNTS","rule_text":" NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
"},{"rule_code":"SO","rule_title":"STOPOVERS","rule_text":" UNLIMITED STOPOVERS PERMITTED IN EACH DIRECTION.
"},{"rule_code":"TF","rule_title":"TRANSFERS/RTGS","rule_text":" UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. NOTE - -SEE FARE DISPLAY FOR ROUTING INFORMATION.
